hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT CASE WHEN game_record.game_type = 'Red5Game' THEN "红五" WHEN game_record.game_type = 'FightLandlordGame' THEN "斗地主" WHEN game_record.game_type = 'PushdownWinGame' THEN "推倒胡" WHEN game_record.game_type = 'QiongWinGame' THEN "穷胡" ELSE "未知" END AS gametype, CASE WHEN player_score.cur_score > 0 THEN "胜利" WHEN player_score.cur_score < 0 THEN "失败" WHEN player_score.cur_score = 0 THEN "平局" ELSE "未知" END AS winandlose, player_score.cur_score AS score, player_score.sys_score AS systemscore, game_record.game_id AS gameId, DATE_FORMAT(player_score.create_time, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") AS createTime FROM player_profile LEFT JOIN player_score ON player_score.profile_id = player_profile.profile_id LEFT JOIN game_record ON player_score.game_id = game_record.game_id WHERE player_profile.profile_id = ? AND player_score.create_time BETWEEN ? AND date_add(?, interval 1 day) AND (CASE WHEN player_score.cur_score > 0 THEN 1 WHEN player_score.cur_score < 0 THEN -1 WHEN player_score.cur_score = 0 THEN 0 END = ? OR 999 = ?) AND (? = '' or game_record.game_type = ?) ORDER BY player_score.create_time desc

SELECT COUNT(*) AS RECORD_COUNT FROM player_profile LEFT JOIN player_score ON player_score.profile_id = player_profile.profile_id LEFT JOIN game_record ON player_score.game_id = game_record.game_id WHERE player_profile.profile_id = ? AND player_score.create_time BETWEEN ? AND date_add(?, interval 1 day) AND (CASE WHEN player_score.cur_score > 0 THEN 1 WHEN player_score.cur_score < 0 THEN -1 WHEN player_score.cur_score = 0 THEN 0 END = ? OR 999 = ?) AND (? = '' or game_record.game_type = ?)
